citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 6/29/15 at 10:15 AM to do a facility inspection.
* Licensee stated that they had a prior engagement and would not be available to do a facility inspection.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Lundy Kendall, Animal Care Inspector
